title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Patryk Olejniczak
raw_text: Cover Art  Connie and Donnie    Patryk is a freelance character concept artist and illustrator who lives in Lodz, Poland. He is a self-taught artist who is influenced by music and films. He especially likes drawing and looking at charismatic and interesting characters. He also enjoys modern architecture and digital photography.
text:
Cover Art
Connie and Donnie
Patryk is a freelance character concept artist and illustrator who lives in Lodz, Poland. He is a self-taught artist who is influenced by music and films. He especially likes drawing and looking at charismatic and interesting characters. He also enjoys modern architecture and digital photography.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Connie and Donnie by Patryk Olejniczak
